com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.hosts.hardware

Interface Tpm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, TpmTypes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TpmStub

    public interface Tpm
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, TpmTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Tpm interface provides methods to get available Trusted Platform Module (TPM) information on a host. This interface was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Tpm.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Tpm#get vAPI operation.
      static interface  Tpm.ListInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Tpm#list vAPI operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.hosts.hardware.TpmTypes

        TpmTypes.FilterSpec, TpmTypes.Info, TpmTypes.Summary

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.hosts.hardware.TpmTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID, RESOURCE_TYPE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tpm.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String tpm)
      Get the TPM details on a host.
      Tpm.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String host)
      Return a list of configured TPMs on a host.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        Tpm.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String host)
        Return a list of configured TPMs on a host. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        A list of configured TPMs.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        Returns:
        instance of Tpm.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if there is a generic error.
        InvalidArgument - if any argument is invalid.
        NotFound - if the host is not found.
        ServiceUnavailable - if too many requests are in progress.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if the caller is not authorized.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires Host.Tpm.Read.

      • get

        Tpm.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String host,
                      java.lang.String tpm)
        Get the TPM details on a host. This method was added in vSphere API 8.0.0.1.

        Invocation Result:
        The TPM info.

        Parameters:
        host - Identifier of the host. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: HostSystem.
        tpm - the TPM identifier. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.vcenter.trusted_infrastructure.hosts.hardware.Tpm.
        Returns:
        instance of Tpm.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if there is a generic error.
        InvalidArgument - if any argument is invalid.
        NotFound - if the TPM is not found or host is not found.
        ServiceUnavailable - if too many requests are in progress.
        Unauthenticated - if the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if the caller is not authorized.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • The resource HostSystem referenced by the parameter host requires Host.Tpm.Read.
